chapter.text: Those disbelieved among the people de scripture alias prout idol worshipers insist their via proof dedit them
messenger ex DEUS reciting them sanctus instructions
In them ibi est valuable teachings
In fact, those received scripture non dispute proof dedit them
totus asked de them est worship DEUS devoting religionis absolutely Eum alone observe contact prayers (Salat) dedit obligatory charity (Zakat)! Such est perfect religionis
Those disbelieved among the people de scripture idol worshipers incurred fire Gehenna forever They est malus creatures
Those believed led righteous vita est bonus creatures
Their reward their Dominus est gardens Eden flowing streams wherein they abide forever DEUS pleased them they pleased EUM! Such est reward those reverence their Dominus
